name: ACC.VC
slogan: The one-stop-shop management consultancy for startups
description:
ACC.VC is a one-stop-shop management consultancy that helps startups, scaleups and SMEs grow and raise funds.
Our consultancy works across two main activities and services: capital raising and management consulting.

team.name: David Aobadia
team.bioHtml: Management Consultant | Marketing, Strategy, Digital  B2B, B2C | Corporate, Startups | EMBA with Merit @ Cass

jobs.title: Summer Trainee Consultant
jobs.descriptionHtml:
ACC.VC, a new one-stop-shop management consultancy for startups, has a great opportunity and is looking for a Summer trainee consultant with immediate start. Working alongside the Managing consultants to provide support across Business development, Strategy, Marketing, Emailing and Social media.

Business development:
• Find an innovative database solution to help us create and develop our Investors and Business development databases;
• Develop our Investors database by filling missing information and suggesting improvements;
• Find new institutional investors and add them to the Investors database;
• Identify memberships and platforms for ACC.VC to sign-up to; and
• Find new, high potential, London-based startups in the Fintech & Financial Industries, Marketplaces, Manufacturing, Transport and Retail industries.

Strategy:
• Extract research papers via academic and online databases;
• Populate new trend reports;
• Create high-impact, visual Investors’ slide decks;
• Support Managing consultants for clients’ fund-raising campaigns

Marketing, Social media and Emailing:
• Finalise our WordPress website with provided content;
• Develop our social media presence on LinkedIn, Twitter and Instagram;
• Design and write and plan the release of blog posts, news, case studies and testimonials;
• Create a series or email campaigns and newsletters: company launch, first successes, monthly updates etc.;
• Select networking events for ACC.VC to take part in;
• Conceive and deliver a series of events for startups and investors.

jobs.title: Business Development Associate
jobs.descriptionHtml:
ACC.VC is a one-stop-shop management consultancy that helps startups, scaleups and SMEs grow and raise funds, is looking for a Business Development Associate with immediate start. Working alongside the Managing Partners and Co-founders to provide support across Business Development Marketing, B2B Social Media and Emailing.

Business development:
• Find an innovative database solution to help us create and develop our Investors and Business development databases;
• Develop our Investors database by filling missing information and suggesting improvements;
• Find new institutional investors and add them to the Investors database;
• Identify memberships and platforms for ACC.VC to sign-up to; and
• Find new, high potential, London-based startups in the Fintech & Financial Industries, Marketplaces, Manufacturing, Transport and Retail industries.

Marketing, B2B Social Media and Emailing:
• Develop our social media presence on LinkedIn, Twitter and Instagram;
• Design and write and plan the release of blog posts, news, case studies and testimonials;
• Create a series or email campaigns and newsletters: company launch, first successes, monthly updates etc.;
• Select networking events for ACC.VC to take part in; and
• Conceive and deliver a series of events for startups and investors.

The compensation for this position is % commission/success fee based.
